message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.maas.util.ConfigUtil'.
Abbreviation in name 'ZKQueue' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
